page.title: 07ST.MARY'S AN ORDINARY DAY
page.content: *********HOME_LIFE******************** A NORMAL SCHOOL DAY Our names are Kara and Kerra we are both eleven years old. Kerra has a brother aged nine and Kara has a brother aged eight. We both have a Mum and Dad. We both have pets. We wake up at 7.00am and get dressed. Then we make breakfast for ourselves and our pets. For breakfast we normally have cornflakes and toast. We then brush our teeth and hair and then we wash our faces.At about 8.30am we leave for school,Kara rides and Kerra walks. Kerra takes a packed lunch to school and Kara goes home for lunch. Kerra normally has peanut butter sandwiches, with a chocolate biscuit, an apple and a packet of crisps she also has a drink of orange juice. Kara likes to eat fish and chips and a glass of milk. She also likes some ice_cream.
